title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - RFC Revision
description: This RFC aims to revise the project requirements for our blockchain-based supply chain tracking system. The updates will focus on a comprehensive analysis of data privacy and security measures, scalability considerations, performance metrics, user interface design, smart contract integration, compliance with regulations and industry standards. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and success criteria will be clearly defined. To improve accessibility and understanding, the document will use clear terminology that all stakeholders can easily comprehend. Upon completion, the revised requirements document will be shared for feedback and iterated as needed. If approved, this RFC will progress to the next state. The revision process will also include a thorough analysis of potential edge cases, error handling strategies, and disaster recovery plans. To ensure the quality and accuracy of the revised document, it is recommended that the review involve multiple team members with diverse expertise. Upon completion, the task will be reassigned to the task-decomposer for further decomposition into individual tasks.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the blockchain network, smart contracts, and integration with existing supply chain systems.

title: Implement Blockchain Network
description: Set up and configure the blockchain network, including node deployment, consensus mechanism, and network governance.

title: Develop Smart Contracts
description: Design and implement the smart contracts for supply chain tracking, including data storage, access control, and event logging.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for supply chain stakeholders to interact with the system, including data visualization and reporting.

title: Integrate with Existing Systems
description: Develop interfaces and APIs to integrate the blockchain-based supply chain tracking system with existing supply chain management systems and data sources.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Design and implement security measures, including access control, data encryption, and auditing mechanisms, to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of supply chain data.

title: Set up Testing and Deployment Infrastructure
description: Establish the testing and deployment infrastructure, including continuous integration, automated testing, and deployment pipelines.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Perform comprehensive testing of the blockchain-based supply chain tracking system, including functional, performance, security, and integration testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the blockchain-based supply chain tracking system to production environments, and implement monitoring and alerting mechanisms for system health and performance.

title: Develop User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including installation guides, user manuals, and troubleshooting guides, for supply chain stakeholders and system administrators.
